title: South Africa crush West Indies in style
content: NEW DELHI (AFP) – Debutant leg-spinner Imran Tahir snared four wickets and AB de Villiers struck 107 not out as South Africa coasted to a seven-wicket win over the West Indies in the World Cup on Thursday. Tahir (4-41) and off-spinner Johan Botha (2-48) shared six wickets to help South Africa bowl out the West…
